|vo_01_01_title_s    = 初次见面…
|vo_01_01_title_t    = 初次見面…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx_s       = 我是愚人众执行官第十一席，「公子」达达利亚。而你&mdash;&mdash;哈，也是能招致纷争之人，实在愉快。我们应该会很合得来吧？
|vo_01_01_tx_t       = 我是愚人眾執行官第十一席，「公子」達達利亞。而（你/妳）&mdash;&mdash;哈，也是能招致紛爭之人，實在愉快。我們應該會很合得來吧？
|vo_01_01_rm         = Wǒ shì Yúrénzhòng Zhíxíngguān dì shíyī xí, "Gōngzǐ" Dádálìyà. Ér nǐ&mdash;&mdash; Ha, yě shì néng zhāozhìfēnzhēng zhī rén, shízài yúkuài. Wǒ mén yīngāi hùi hěn hédelái ba?
|vo_01_01_tl         = I am the Eleventh of the Fatui Harbingers, "Childe" Tartaglia. And you're... Heh, also someone who brings all sorts of trouble, fine by me. We'll get along splendidly, won't we?

|vo_02_01_title_s    = 闲聊・闲散
|vo_02_01_title_t    = 閒聊・閒散

|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Idleness.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx_s       = 在这干站着，也不会有对手找上门的。
|vo_02_01_tx_t       = 在這乾站著，也不會有對手找上門的。
|vo_02_01_rm         = Zài zhè gàn zhànzhe, yě bùhuì yǒu dùishǒu zhǎoshàngmén de.
|vo_02_01_tl         = Even if [we] waste [our] time standing around here, no opponents are going to come knocking on [our] door.

|vo_02_02_title_t    = 閒聊・比試
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Test of Skills
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Test of Skills.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx_s       = 嗯&mdash;&mdash;附近就没有什么值得一战的强敌吗？
|vo_02_02_tx_t       = 嗯&mdash;&mdash;附近就沒有什麼值得一戰的強敵嗎？
|vo_02_02_rm         = Ńg&mdash;&mdash; fùjìn jiù méiyǒu shen me zhídé yī zhàn de qiáng dí ma?
|vo_02_02_tl         = Hmm&mdash;&mdash; Are there no powerful enemies worth fighting nearby?
|vo_02_03_title_s    = 闲聊・愚人众
|vo_02_03_title_t    = 閒聊・愚人眾
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: The Fatui
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - The Fatui.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx_s       = 不知道其他执行官在忙些什么呢？嗯，算了，无非又是那些莫名其妙的「宏大计划」吧。
|vo_02_03_tx_t       = 不知道其他執行官在忙些什麼呢？嗯，算了，無非又是那些莫名其妙的「宏大計畫」吧。
|vo_02_03_rm         = Bùzhidào qítā Zhíxíngguān zài máng xiē shénme ne? Ńg, suàn le, wúfēi yòu shì nàxiē mòmíngqímiào de "pángdà jìhuà" ba.
|vo_02_03_tl         = I wonder what the other Harbingers are busying themselves with? Eh, forget it, it's probably some of their weird "grand plans" again.
|vo_02_04_title_s    = 闲聊・雪国故土
|vo_02_04_title_t    = 閒聊・雪國故土

|vo_02_04_tx_s       = 在我老家的雪原里这么闲站着的话，早该被冻僵了。哈哈哈。
|vo_02_04_tx_t       = 在我老家的雪原裡這麼閒站著的話，早該被凍僵了。哈哈哈。
|vo_02_04_rm         = Zài wǒ lǎojiā de xuěyuánlǐ zhème xián zhànzhe dehuà, zǎo gāi bèi dòngjiāng le. Hāhā hā.
|vo_02_04_tl         = If [we] stood around like this in the snowfields of my homeland, [we] would've long since frozen stiff. Hahaha.

|vo_03_01_tx_s       = 雨点打在水面上的声音，会把鱼儿吓跑。相比之下，雨后是钓鱼的好时机。
|vo_03_01_tx_t       = 雨點打在水面上的聲音，會把魚兒嚇跑。相比之下，雨後是釣魚的好時機。
|vo_03_01_rm         = Yǔdiǎn dǎ zài shǔimiàn shàng de shēngyīn, huì bǎ yú er xià pǎo. Xiāngbǐzhīxià, yǔ hòu shì diàoyú de hǎo shíjī.
|vo_03_01_tl         = The sound of raindrops hitting the water will scare away the fish. On the other hand, a good time to go fishing is after it rains.
|vo_03_02_title_s    = 下雪的时候・异国
|vo_03_02_title_t    = 下雪的時候・異國
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When It Snows: Foreign Country
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows - Foreign Country.ogg

|vo_03_02_tx_t       = 哈哈哈，不知老家那邊，是否也在下雪？
|vo_03_02_rm         = Hāhāhā, bùzhī lǎojiā nà biān, shìfǒu yě zài xiàxuě?
|vo_03_02_tl         = Hahaha, I wonder if it's also snowing in my hometown?
|vo_03_03_title_s    = 下雪的时候・至冬国
|vo_03_03_title_t    = 下雪的時候・至冬國
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows: Snezhnaya
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows - Snezhnaya.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx_s       = 多好的雪！天地都和月光一样干净，在这样的舞台上泼洒的鲜血才格外炙烈。
|vo_03_03_tx_t       = 多好的雪！天地都和月光一樣乾淨，在這樣的舞臺上潑灑的鮮血才格外炙烈。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Duō hǎo de xuě! Tiāndì dōu hé yuèguāng yīyàng gānjìng, zài zhèyàng de wǔtái shàng pōsǎ de xiānxuě cái géwài zhì liè.
|vo_03_03_tl         = What wonderful snow! The world is as clean as moonlight, and blood spilled on a stage like this will be especially vivid.

|vo_03_04_tx_t       = 啊！風中傳來了紛爭的氣息。
|vo_03_04_rm         = A! Fēng zhōng chuánlái le fēnzhēng de qìxí.
|vo_03_04_tl         = Ah! The wind carries the scent of conflict.
|vo_03_05_title_s    = 刮大风了・异国
|vo_03_05_title_t    = 刮大風了・異國

|vo_03_05_tx_t       = 真是暢快的風！
|vo_03_05_rm         = Zhēnshi chàngkuài de fēng!

|vo_03_06_title_s    = 刮大风了・至冬国
|vo_03_06_title_t    = 刮大風了・至冬國
|vo_03_06_subtitle   = Wind Is Building Up: Snezhnaya
|vo_03_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} Wind Is Building Up - Snezhnaya.ogg
|vo_03_06_tx_s       = 感觉身体和头脑，都被穿过身体的风洗净了。真舒畅。
|vo_03_06_tx_t       = 感覺身體和頭腦，都被穿過身體的風洗淨了。真舒暢。

|vo_04_01_title_s    = 早上好…
|vo_04_01_title_t    = 早安…

|vo_04_01_tx_s       = 哟，伙伴！今天精神不错啊。
|vo_04_01_tx_t       = 喲，夥伴！今天精神不錯啊。
|vo_04_01_rm         = Yō, huǒbàn! Jīntiān jīngshén bùcuò a.

|vo_04_02_title_s    = 中午好…
|vo_04_02_title_t    = 午安…

|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx_s       = 你看起来状态还不错嘛，要不陪我切磋一下？
|vo_04_02_tx_t       = （你/妳）看起來狀態還不錯嘛，要不陪我切磋一下？
|vo_04_02_rm         = Nǐ kànqǐlái zhuàngtài hái bùcuò ma, yàobù péi wǒ qiēcuō yīxià?

|vo_04_03_title_s    = 晚上好…
|vo_04_03_title_t    = 晚上好…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx_s       = 哈&mdash;&mdash;吃得真爽。活动活动，消化一下好了。
|vo_04_03_tx_t       = 哈&mdash;&mdash;吃得真爽。活動活動，消化一下好了。

|vo_04_04_rm         = Zhēnshi yúkuài de yītiān. Míngtiān zàijiàn, huǒbàn!

|vo_05_01_title_s    = 关于{name_s}自己…
|vo_05_01_title_t    = 關於達達利亞自己…
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx_s       = 身为战士，要时刻把挑战之心系于刀尖之上。但无论胜败，都是无可替代的珍贵经历。
|vo_05_01_tx_t       = 身為戰士，要時刻把挑戰之心繫於刀尖之上。但無論勝敗，都是無可替代的珍貴經歷。
|vo_05_01_rm         = Shēnwéi zhànshì, yào shíkè bǎ tiǎozhàn zhī xīn xì yú dāo jiān zhī shàng. Dàn wúlùn shèngbài, dōu shì wú kě tìdài de zhēnguì jīnglì.
|vo_05_01_tl         = As a warrior, [I] must constantly fasten [my] desire for a challenge to the tip of [my] blade. Regardless of the outcome, all [combat encounters] are valuable experiences that cannot be replaced.

|vo_06_01_title_s    = 关于我们・同僚
|vo_06_01_title_t    = 關於我們・同僚
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Comrades
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Comrades.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx_s       = 与你同行的事情，在别的执行官当中，已经传开了吧。哼，真想看看那帮人脸上的表情，哈哈哈。
|vo_06_01_tx_t       = 與（你/妳）同行的事情，在別的執行官當中，已經傳開了吧。哼，真想看看那幫人臉上的表情，哈哈哈。
|vo_06_01_rm         = Yǔ nǐ tóngxíng de shìqíng, zài bié de Zhíxíngguān dāngzhōng, yǐjīng chuánkāi le ba. Hēng, zhēn xiǎng kànkàn nà bāng rén liǎnshàng de biǎoqíng, hāhāhā.
|vo_06_01_tl         = News of my travels with you has probably spread to the other Harbingers. Heh, I'd love to see the expressions on the faces of that lot, hahaha.
|vo_06_02_title_s    = 关于我们・兵器
|vo_06_02_title_t    = 關於我們・兵器
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Weapons
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Weapons.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx_s       = 弓，其实是我最不擅长的武器。正因如此，我才要征服它。
|vo_06_02_tx_t       = 弓，其實是我最不擅長的武器。正因如此，我才要征服它。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Gōng, qíshí shì wǒ zuì bù shàncháng de wǔqì. Zhèng yīn rúcǐ, wǒ cái yào zhēngfú tā.
|vo_06_02_tl         = The bow is actually the weapon I'm the least adept at. That's precisely why I want to conquer it.
|vo_06_03_title_s    = 关于我们・生存
|vo_06_03_title_t    = 關於我們・生存
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Survival
|vo_06_03_friendship = 6
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Survival.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx_s       = 连神之眼也没有的你，竟有这样的力量，真是令人期待啊…在你抵达自己的极限之前，与我放下一切、决一死战之前，绝对不要倒下啊，伙伴！我绝不允许你倒下。
|vo_06_03_tx_t       = 連神之眼也沒有的（你/妳），竟有這樣的力量，真是令人期待啊…在（你/妳）抵達自己的極限之前，與我放下一切、決一死戰之前，絕對不要倒下啊，夥伴！我絕不允許（你/妳）倒下。
|vo_06_03_rm         = Lián Shénzhīyǎn yě méiyǒu de nǐ, jìng yǒu zhèyàng de lìliàng, zhēnshi lìngrén qídài a... Zài nǐ dǐdá zìjǐ de jíxiàn zhīqián, yǔ wǒ fàngxià yīqiè, jué yī sǐzhàn zhīqián, juéduì bùyào dàoxià a, huǒbàn! Wǒ jué bù yǔnxǔ nǐ dàoxià.
|vo_06_03_tl         = That you have such strength, without even a Vision, sure gives a person something to look forward to... Before you can reach your limit [of your abilities], and before I drop everything so [we] can fight to the death, you'd better not fall, comrade! I absolutely will not let you fall.
|vo_06_04_title_s    = 关于我们・邀请
|vo_06_04_title_t    = 關於我們・邀請
|vo_06_04_subtitle   = About Us: Invitation
|vo_06_04_friendship = 6
|vo_06_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Invitation.ogg
|vo_06_04_tx_s       = 伙伴，要不要加入愚人众？嗯，当我没说。以你现在的身份，和你在一起，连光明正大和其他执行官厮杀的理由也有了。这样的机会，实在无法放弃啊，哈。
|vo_06_04_tx_t       = 夥伴，要不要加入愚人眾？嗯，當我沒說。以（你/妳）現在的身分，和（你/妳）在一起，連光明正大和其他執行官廝殺的理由也有了。這樣的機會，實在無法放棄啊，哈。
|vo_06_04_rm         = Huǒbàn, yàobù yào jiārù Yúrénzhòng? Ńg, dāng wǒ méi shuō. Yǐ nǐ xiànzài de shēnfèn, hé nǐ zàiyīqǐ, lián guāngmíngzhèngdà hé qítā Zhíxíngguān sīshā de lǐyóu yě yǒule. Zhèyàng de jīhuì, shízài wúfǎ fàngqì a, hā.
|vo_06_04_tl         = Comrade, do you want to join the Fatui? Hm, pretend I didn't say anything. With your present abilities, if I stick with you, I'll have a reason to take on the other Harbingers in battle, no tricks needed. I can't possibly give up such an opportunity, heh.

|vo_07_01_title_s    = 关于「神之眼」…
|vo_07_01_title_t    = 關於「神之眼」…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx_s       = 只要能让我变强，「神之眼」也好，「邪眼」也好，师承深渊的罪人也好，都无所谓…
|vo_07_01_tx_t       = 只要能讓我變強，「神之眼」也好，「邪眼」也好，師承深淵的罪人也好，都無所謂…
|vo_07_01_rm         = Zhǐyào néng ràng wǒ biàn qiáng, "Shénzhīyǎn" yěhǎo, "Xiéyǎn" yěhǎo, shī chéng Shēnyuān de zuìrén yěhǎo, dōu wúsuǒwèi...
|vo_07_01_tl         = If it makes me stronger, a Vision is fine, a [[Delusion]] is fine, apprenticing to a sinner of the [[Abyss]] is fine, I'm not picky...
|vo_07_02_title_s    = 有什么想要分享…
|vo_07_02_title_t    = 有什麼想要分享…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx_s       = 在无尽的雪原里，生命随时都会被碎骨一般的纯白天地吞噬，连足迹也无法留下。为此，我们每日都在与看不见的敌人战斗。
|vo_07_02_tx_t       = 在無盡的雪原裡，生命隨時都會被碎骨一般的純白天地吞噬，連足跡也無法留下。為此，我們每日都在與看不見的敵人戰鬥。
|vo_07_02_rm         = Zài wújìn de xuěyuánlǐ, shēngmìng suíshí doū huì bèi suìgǔ yībān de chúnbái tiāndì tūnshì, lián zújì yě wúfǎ liúxià. Wèi cǐ, wǒmen měi rì dōu zài yǔ kànbùjiàn de dírén zhàndòu.
|vo_07_02_tl         = In the endless snowfields, life can be swallowed by the bone fragment-like pure-white world at any time, not even able to leave behind footprints. So, every day we fight against an enemy that we can't see.
|vo_07_03_title_s    = 感兴趣的见闻…
|vo_07_03_title_t    = 感興趣的見聞…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx_s       = 我曾经在世界的深渊与无名的巨大魔兽对视。总有一天，我会堂堂正正地，将那强大得令我骨髓冻结的怪物斩杀。届时，就拜托你当我的见证者了，伙伴！
|vo_07_03_tx_t       = 我曾經在世界的深淵與無名的巨大魔獸對視。總有一天，我會堂堂正正地，將那強大得令我骨髓凍結的怪物斬殺。屆時，就拜託（你/妳）當我的見證者了，夥伴！
|vo_07_03_rm         = Wǒ céngjīng zài shìjiè de shēnyuān yǔ wúmíng de jùdà móshòu duìshì. Zǒng yǒu yītiān, wǒ huì tángtángzhèngzhèng de, jiāng nà qiángdà dé lìng wǒ gǔsuǐ dòngjié de guàiwù zhǎnshā. Jièshí, jiù bàituō nǐ dāng wǒ de jiànzhèng zhěle, huǒbàn!
|vo_07_03_tl         = I once came face-to-face with an unnamed, enormous demon beast in the world's abyss. There will come a day when I will march over and behead the monster that had once made my bone marrow freeze [in fear]. When that day comes, I ask you to be my witness, comrade!

|vo_08_01_title_s    = 关于丝柯克…
|vo_08_01_title_t    = 關於絲柯克…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Skirk]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Skirk.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx_s       = 有多少年没见到师父了呢。哼，下次和她比试的时候，希望至少能逼她用上双手来对付我。
|vo_08_01_tx_t       = 有多少年沒見到師父了呢。哼，下次和她比試的時候，希望至少能逼她用上雙手來對付我。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Yǒu duō shào nián méi jiàn dào shīfu le ne. Hēng, xiàcì hé tā bǐshi de shíhòu, xīwàng zhìshǎo néng bī tā yòng shàng shuāngshǒu lái duìfù wǒ.
|vo_08_01_tl         = How many years has it been since I last saw my master? Hm, next time I spar with her, I hope I can at least force her to use both hands when she faces me.
|vo_08_02_title_s    = 关于钟离・掂量
|vo_08_02_title_t    = 關於鍾離・掂量
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Zhongli]]: Pondering
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli - Pondering.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx_s       = 那家伙城府很深，不知真正的实力又如何呢…哼，真令人期待。
|vo_08_02_tx_t       = 那傢伙城府很深，不知真正的實力又如何呢…哼，真令人期待。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Nà jiāhuo chéngfǔ hěn shēn, bùzhī zhēnzhèng de shílì yòu rúhé ne... Hēng, zhēn lìngrén qídài.
|vo_08_02_tl         = That guy is difficult to read,<ref group="Translation Note">The term {{lang|mini=1|zh={{wt|城府||Chinese}}|zh_rm=chéngfǔ}} is a metaphor which refers to a person's sophisticated and indecipherable protection of their own thoughts. The term is also used to describe cities defended by walls and moats.</ref> [so] I don't know the true extent of his strength... Heh, it really gives a person something to look forward to.
|vo_08_03_title_s    = 关于钟离・挑战
|vo_08_03_title_t    = 關於鍾離・挑戰
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Zhongli]]: Challenge
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_quest      = A New Star Approaches
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Zhongli - Challenge.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx_s       = 钟离先生，最近可好啊？嗯…还不错？看来他倒是挺适应作为「凡人」的生活嘛。可恶…竟然把我骗得团团转，只有痛痛快快地交战一场才能平息这份不甘！<br />你说…我打不过他？哈哈哈…
|vo_08_03_tx_t       = 鍾離先生，最近可好啊？嗯…還不錯？看來他倒是挺適應作為「凡人」的生活嘛。可惡…竟然把我騙得團團轉，只有痛痛快快地交戰一場才能平息這份不甘！<br />（你/妳）說…我打不過他？哈哈哈…
|vo_08_03_rm         = Zhōnglí-xiānshēng, zuìjìn kěhǎo a? Ńg... hái bùcuò? Kànlái tā daòshì tǐng shìyìng zuòwéi "fánrén" de shēnghuó ma. Kěwù... jìngrán bǎ wǒ piàn dé tuántuán zhuàn, zhǐyǒu tòngtòngkuàikuài de jiāozhàn yì chǎng cáinéng píngxí zhè fèn bùgān!<br />Nǐ shuō... wǒ dǎ bùguò tā? Hāhāhā...
|vo_08_03_tl         = So how has Mr. Zhongli been doing lately? Hm...? Not bad? Looks like he might actually be well-suited for "mortal" life. How annoying... Leading me on in circles like that, only by duking it out for a round right now can this be settled!<br />You say... I'm no match for him? Hahaha...
|vo_08_04_title_s    = 关于「女皇」…
|vo_08_04_title_t    = 關於「女皇」…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Tsaritsa]]
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Tsaritsa.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx_s       = 女皇大人其实很温柔。但正是因为太温柔了，所以才不得不变得冷酷。正是因为梦想和平，才要向整个世界宣战。也正是因为她与世界为敌，我才有机会与你相识。
|vo_08_04_tx_t       = 女皇大人其實很溫柔。但正是因為太溫柔了，所以才不得不變得冷酷。正是因為夢想和平，才要向整個世界宣戰。也正是因為她與世界為敵，我才有機會與（你/妳）相識。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Nǚhuáng-dàrén qíshí hěn wēnróu. Dàn zhèngshì yīnwèi tài wēnróule, suǒyǐ cái bùdé bù biàn dé lěngkù. Zhèngshì yīnwèi mèngxiǎng hépíng, cái yào xiàng zhěnggè shìjiè xuānzhàn. Yě zhèngshì yīnwèi tā yǔ shìjiè wèi dí, wǒ cái yǒu jīhuì yǔ nǐ xiāngshí.
|vo_08_04_tl         = Her Majesty the Tsaritsa [is] actually very gentle. But because [she is] too gentle, [she has] no choice but to become unchanging cold. It is because she dreams of peace, that she has declared war on the whole world. And it is because she views the world as her enemy, that I had the chance to meet you.
|vo_08_05_title_s    = 关于法尔伽…
|vo_08_05_title_t    = 關於法爾伽…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx_s       = 法尔伽吗？哼，光是想到，有朝一日能和西风骑士团的顶点、传说中的「北风骑士」交手，就兴奋得颤抖。活在这个世界上，真是美妙。
|vo_08_05_tx_t       = 法爾伽嗎？哼，光是想到，有朝一日能和西風騎士團的頂點、傳說中的「北風騎士」交手，就興奮得顫抖。活在這個世界上，真是美妙。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Fǎ'ěrjiā ma? Hēng, guāngshì xiǎngdào, yǒuzhāoyīrì néng hé Xīfēng Qíshìtuán de dǐngdiǎn, chuánshuō zhōng de "Běifēng Qíshì" jiāoshǒu, jiù xīngfèn dé chàndǒu. Huózài zhège shìjiè shàng, zhēnshi měimiào.
|vo_08_05_tl         = Varka? Heh, just thinking about one day dueling the pinnacle of the Knights of Favonius, the renowned "Knight of Boreas," makes me tremble in excitement. Living in this world truly is a beautiful thing.

|vo_08_06_title_s    = 关于「丑角」…
|vo_08_06_title_t    = 關於「丑角」…
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Pierro|The Jester]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Jester.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx_s       = 他是愚人众最初的执行官，也是今日执行官们的领袖，只会在大场面出现。至于他的功绩…坦白说，我不关心。我效忠的对象是女皇大人。
|vo_08_06_tx_t       = 他是愚人眾最初的執行官，也是今日執行官們的領袖，只會在大場面出現。至於他的功績…坦白說，我不關心。我效忠的對象是女皇大人。
|vo_08_06_rm         = 
|vo_08_06_tl         = He was the Fatui's most original Harbinger, and also the leader of the Harbingers today, appearing only on big occasions. As for his achievements...to be blunt, I don't care. My loyalty is with the Tsaritsa.

|vo_08_07_title_s    = 关于「队长」…
|vo_08_07_title_t    = 關於「隊長」…
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Il Capitano|The Captain]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Captain.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx_s       = 我曾见过他在战场上的模样，实在是过于强悍了。或许我的席位太靠后了吧，让他没有留意到我。但就算今天被他忽视，明天，我也会让他看到我的实力。
|vo_08_07_tx_t       = 我曾見過他在戰場上的模樣，實在是過於強悍了。或許我的席位太靠後了吧，讓他沒有留意到我。但就算今天被他忽視，明天，我也會讓他看到我的實力。
|vo_08_07_rm         = 
|vo_08_07_tl         = I once saw his manner on the battlefield, and it was much too incredible. Perhaps I'm ranked too low and he couldn't notice me. But even if he underestimates me today, I would make him see my worth again tomorrow.

|vo_08_08_title_s    = 关于「博士」…
|vo_08_08_title_t    = 關於「博士」…
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Il Dottore|The Doctor]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Doctor.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx_s       = 听说他把不同年龄段的自己切片做成了义体，负责不同的任务。没办法，我的同僚都是些不太正常的人。反过来想想，要是某一天，我遇见了自己的义体…哈，肯定得和对方决出真正能活下去的那一个。
|vo_08_08_tx_t       = 聽說他把不同年齡段的自己切片做成了義體，負責不同的任務。沒辦法，我的同僚都是些不太正常的人。反過來想想，要是某一天，我遇見了自己的義體…哈，肯定得和對方決出真正能活下去的那一個。
|vo_08_08_rm         = 
|vo_08_08_tl         = I heard that he cuts off parts of himself at different ages and makes them into prostheses with different tasks. Nothing I could do, all my comrades are some weird people. On the other hand, if there is a day when I meet my own prosthesis... Ha, we'd have to fight and see who survives.

|vo_08_09_title_s    = 关于「少女」…
|vo_08_09_title_t    = 關於「少女」…
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Columbina|Damselette]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Damselette.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx_s       = 愚人众执行官的席位是按照实力划分的，我不明白那个女孩为什么是「第三席」。有机会的话，我是想和排在我之前的执行官都比试一遍啦，但总有种不太想和她交手的感觉…不管怎么说，你也小心一点。
|vo_08_09_tx_t       = 愚人眾執行官的席位是按照實力劃分的，我不明白那個女孩為什麼是「第三席」。有機會的話，我是想和排在我之前的執行官都比試一遍啦，但總有種不太想和她交手的感覺…不管怎麼說，(你/妳)也小心一點。
|vo_08_09_rm         = 
|vo_08_09_tl         = The rankings of the Fatui Harbingers are decided by ability, and I can't make out why that girl ranks third. If I had the chance, I would have liked to challenge all the Harbingers ranking above me, though I'm hesitant when it comes to her...nonetheless, you should also be careful.

|vo_08_10_title_s    = 关于「仆人」…
|vo_08_10_title_t    = 關於「僕人」…
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Arlecchino|The Knave]]
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Knave.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx_s       = 我不讨厌有自己打算的人。毕竟我加入愚人众，也是为了获得更多争斗的机会。但这个人，我不喜欢。如果背叛能够获得收益，她会毫不留情地向女皇大人挥剑。她的眼里只有疯狂。
|vo_08_10_tx_t       = 我不討厭有自己打算的人。畢竟我加入愚人眾，也是為了獲得更多爭鬥的機會。但這個人，我不喜歡。如果背叛能夠獲得收益，她會毫不留情地向女皇大人揮劍。她的眼裡只有瘋狂。
|vo_08_10_rm         = 
|vo_08_10_tl         = I don't hate people who have their own agendas. I myself joined the Fatui for more fighting opportunities. I don't like this person, however. If betrayal comes with benefits, she would turn against the Tsaritsa without hesitance. There is only insanity in her eyes.

|vo_08_11_title_s    = 关于「公鸡」…
|vo_08_11_title_t    = 關於「公雞」…
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Pulcinella|The Rooster]]
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Rooster.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx_s       = 我不懂什么人情世故。但我知道，他是真心想要帮助我的。他看我的眼神，就像看待家人一样。哦，说到这个，冬妮娅和托克给我回信的时候，时常提到他送去家里的馅饼和礼物。在我暂别冬都期间，他确实按照约定，照顾好了我的家人们。
|vo_08_11_tx_t       = 我不懂什麼人情世故。但我知道，他是真心想要幫助我的。他看我的眼神，就像看待家人一樣。哦，說到這個，冬妮婭和托克給我回信的時候，時常提到他送去家裡的餡餅和禮物。在我暫別冬都期間，他確實按照約定，照顧好了我的家人們。
|vo_08_11_rm         = 
|vo_08_11_tl         = I don't know his real intentions. But I do know he genuinely wanted to help me. He looks at me like how he looks at family. Ah, speaking of this, Tonia and Teucer often mention in their letters the pies and gifts he sends home. While I was away from Snezhnaya, he took care of my family as promised.

|vo_08_12_title_s    = 关于「木偶」…
|vo_08_12_title_t    = 關於「木偶」…
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Sandrone|Marionette]]
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Marionette.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx_s       = 好像是个埋头研究的人？我想想，那些机械是不是都跟她有关啊。总之，仅有几次的见面中，她一副想杀了我的眼神。可我完全不记得做过什么惹她生气的事。
|vo_08_12_tx_t       = 好像是個埋頭研究的人？我想想，那些機械是不是都跟她有關啊。總之，僅有幾次的見面中，她一副想殺了我的眼神。可我完全不記得做過什麼惹她生氣的事。
|vo_08_12_rm         = 
|vo_08_12_tl         = I think she's the type with her head buried in research. I wonder if all the machines have to do with her. Anyways, in the few times we met, she looked as if she wanted to murder me. But I don't remember anything I've done that could make her mad.

|vo_08_13_title_s    = 关于「富人」…
|vo_08_13_title_t    = 關於「富人」…
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Pantalone|Regrator]]
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Regrator.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx_s       = 哦，那个满脑子「宏大计划」的野心家。他的那些理论，我半句都听不进去啊。总之，只要后备资金管够就好啦。
|vo_08_13_tx_t       = 哦，那個滿腦子「宏大計畫」的野心家。他的那些理論，我半句都聽不進去啊。總之，只要儲備資金夠用就好啦。
|vo_08_13_rm         = 
|vo_08_13_tl         = Ah, that wild man with his brain full of "big plans." I can't sit through half a sentence when it comes to his theories. In the end, though, it's good that he keeps our cash reserve stocked up.

|vo_08_14_title_s    = 关于「女士」…
|vo_08_14_title_t    = 關於「女士」…
|vo_08_14_friendship = 4
|vo_08_14_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_14_subtitle   = About [[La Signora|The Fair Lady]]
|vo_08_14_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Fair Lady.ogg
|vo_08_14_tx_s       = 我和她合不来，你是知道的。如今也不必评价她本人了吧。对于执行官而言，死期并不掌握在自己手上…不过，放心，我是无论如何，都会拼尽全力活下去的。
|vo_08_14_tx_t       = 我和她合不來，(你/妳)是知道的。如今也不必評價她本人了吧。對於執行官而言，死期並不掌握在自己手上…不過，放心，我是無論如何，都會拼盡全力活下去的。
|vo_08_14_rm         = 
|vo_08_14_tl         = I don't get along with her, you know that. There is no longer a need to comment on her. As a Harbinger, you can't control when you die...although, no need to worry, as I would try my best to live on no matter what.

|vo_08_15_title_s    = 关于「散兵」…
|vo_08_15_title_t    = 關於「散兵」…
|vo_08_15_friendship = 4
|vo_08_15_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_15_subtitle   = About [[Scaramouche|The Balladeer]]
|vo_08_15_file       = VO_{language}{character} About The Balladeer.ogg
|vo_08_15_tx_s       = 他带着「神之心」与我们失去了联络，后面才有了追回那颗心的行动。我倒是不介意去四处走走，说不定还能在哪儿和你偶遇？
|vo_08_15_tx_t       = 他帶著「神之心」與我們失去了聯絡，後面才有了追回那顆心的行動。我倒是不介意去四處走走，說不定還能在哪兒和(你/妳)偶遇？
|vo_08_15_rm         = 
|vo_08_15_tl         = He got the Gnosis and lost contact with us; only later did we start tracking it down. I myself don't mind traveling around, and perhaps I could even come across you? 

|vo_09_01_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其一
|vo_09_01_title_t    = 想要瞭解達達利亞・其一
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx_s       = 记住了，伙伴，我是终有一天要征服世界的人！
|vo_09_01_tx_t       = 記住了，夥伴，我是終有一天要征服世界的人！
|vo_09_01_rm         = Jìzhù le, huǒbàn, wǒ shì zhōng yǒu yī tiān yào zhēngfú shìjiè de rén!
|vo_09_01_tl         = Remember, comrade, I'm going to conquer the world one day!
|vo_09_02_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其二
|vo_09_02_title_t    = 想要瞭解達達利亞・其二
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx_s       = 无论决斗的对手是神，还是深渊的魔兽，只要有形，就有得胜的可能。但执行官当中，有的人热衷于权术、阴谋那些…「看不见的手段」。我跟那些无聊的家伙合不来。
|vo_09_02_tx_t       = 無論決鬥的對手是神，還是深淵的魔獸，只要有形，就有得勝的可能。但執行官當中，有的人熱衷於權術、陰謀那些…「看不見的手段」。我跟那些無聊的傢伙合不來。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Wúlùn juédòu de duìshǒu shì shén, háishì Shēnyuān de móshòu, zhǐyào yǒuxíng, jiù yǒu déshèng de kěnéng. Dàn Zhíxíngguān dāngzhōng, yǒu de rén rèzhōng yú quánshù, yīnmóu nàxiē... "kàn bùjiàn de shǒuduàn". Wǒ gēn nàxiē wúliáo de jiāhuo hébulái.
|vo_09_02_tl         = Whether my opponent in battle is a god or a monster from the Abyss, so long as they have a shape, then there is a chance of victory. But among the Harbingers, some are obsessed with power plays, scheming those... "unseen tricks." I can't get along with those kinds of boring guys.
|vo_09_03_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其三
|vo_09_03_title_t    = 想要瞭解達達利亞・其三
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx_s       = 这里的天空和故乡的天空是连成一片的。抬头看见雪一样的月光，就能想到，老家的人们也能看见同一个月亮。不知道弟弟妹妹…哈，他们有没有变成出色的战士呢？
|vo_09_03_tx_t       = 這裡的天空和故鄉的天空是連成一片的。抬頭看見雪一樣的月光，就能想到，老家的人們也能看見同一個月亮。不知道弟弟妹妹…哈，他們有沒有變成出色的戰士呢？
|vo_09_03_rm         = Zhèlǐ de tiānkōng hé gùxiāng de tiānkōng shì lián chéng yí piàn de. Táitóu kànjiàn xuě yíyàng de yuèguāng, jiù néng xiǎngdào, lǎojiā de rénmen yě néng kànjiàn tóngyī gè yuèliàng. Bù zhīdào dìdì mèimei... Hā, tāmen yǒu méiyǒu biànchéng chūsè de zhànshì ne?
|vo_09_03_tl         = The sky here and the sky of [my] homeland are all part of a single [sky]. Looking up and seeing the snow-like moonlight, it brings to mind that the people of my hometown can also see the same moon. [I] don't know if [my] little brothers and sister... Heh, have they become powerful warriors?
|vo_09_04_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其四
|vo_09_04_title_t    = 想要瞭解達達利亞・其四
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship = 4
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx_s       = 伙伴，不要忘记：厮杀的时候，绝不能用什么「燃烧起来了」之类的蠢话来驱策自己。毕竟，燃尽之后，除了灰烬，什么也不会剩下。无论如何，都要活下去。
|vo_09_04_tx_t       = 夥伴，不要忘記：廝殺的時候，絕不能用什麼「燃燒起來了」之類的蠢話來驅策自己。畢竟，燃盡之後，除了灰燼，什麼也不會剩下。無論如何，都要活下去。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Huǒbàn, bùyào wàngjì: Sīshā de shíhòu, jué bùnéng yòng shénme "ránshāo qǐláile" zhīlèi de chǔnhuà lái qūcè zìjǐ. Bìjìng, rán jìn zhīhòu, chúle huījìn, shénme yě bùhuì shèngxià. Wúlùnrúhé, dōu yào huó xiàqù.
|vo_09_04_tl         = Comrade, don't forget: While fighting, never say something dumb like "I'm on fire" to hype yourself up. After all, after a fire dies out, nothing will be left besides ashes. No matter what, the most important thing is to survive.
|vo_09_05_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其五
|vo_09_05_title_t    = 想要瞭解達達利亞・其五
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx_s       = 时间过得真快。总有一天，我要让你亲眼看见我征服世界的样子、我把神的王座踩在脚下的样子。哈哈，在那之前，你可绝对不要倒下啊，伙伴！
|vo_09_05_tx_t       = 時間過得真快。總有一天，我要讓（你/妳）親眼看見我征服世界的樣子、我把神的王座踩在腳下的樣子。哈哈，在那之前，（你/妳）可絕對不要倒下啊，夥伴！
|vo_09_05_rm         = Shíjiān guòdé zhēn kuài. Zǒngyǒu yìtiān, wǒ yào ràng nǐ qīnyǎn kànjiàn wǒ zhēngfú shìjiè de yàngzi, wǒ bǎ shén de wángzuò cǎi zài jiǎoxià de yàngzi. Hāhā, zài nà zhīqián, nǐ kě juéduì bùyào dàoxià a, huǒbàn!
|vo_09_05_tl         = Time really flies. When the day comes, I want you to see with your own eyes how I look as I conquer the world, [and] how I look as I trample upon the thrones of the gods. Haha, until that happens, you better not fall, comrade!

|vo_10_01_title_s    = {name}的爱好…
|vo_10_01_title_t    = 達達利亞的愛好…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx_s       = 冰钓和决斗的道理是相通的，关键是耐心与决断。这么说来，同样的道理好像也能应用在人生中的所有事情上？
|vo_10_01_tx_t       = 冰釣和決鬥的道理是相通的，關鍵是耐心與決斷。這麼說來，同樣的道理好像也能應用在人生中的所有事情上？
|vo_10_01_rm         = Bīngdiào hé juédòu de dàolǐ shì xiāngtōng de, guānjiàn shì nàixīn yǔ juéduàn. Zhème shuō lái, tóngyàng de dàolǐ hǎoxiàng yě néng yìngyòng zài rénshēng zhōng de suǒyǒu shìqíng shàng?
|vo_10_01_tl         = Ice fishing and fighting share the same principles; the key is patience and decisiveness. Putting it that way, though, these principles probably apply to everything in life?
|vo_10_02_title_s    = {name}的烦恼…
|vo_10_02_title_t    = 達達利亞的煩惱…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx_s       = 嗯？烦恼的事情…哼，与你同行，总是有值得挑战的强敌，根本没空思考这种琐碎无趣的小事。
|vo_10_02_tx_t       = 嗯？煩惱的事情…哼，與（你/妳）同行，總是有值得挑戰的強敵，根本沒空思考這種瑣碎無趣的小事。
|vo_10_02_rm         = Ńg? Fánnǎo de shìqíng... Hēng, yǔ nǐ tóngxíng, zǒngshì yǒu zhídé tiǎozhàn de qiángdí, gēnběn méi kōng sīkǎo zhèzhǒng suǒsuì wúqù de xiǎoshì.
|vo_10_02_tl         = Hm? Things that annoy [me]? Heh, there's always powerful enemies worth challenging when I'm traveling with you, so I've never had to waste time thinking about such trivial matters.
|vo_10_03_title_s    = 喜欢的食物…
|vo_10_03_title_t    = 喜歡的食物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx_s       = 这个世界上，充满了美妙的料理和酣畅淋漓的战斗。活着真是美妙！
|vo_10_03_tx_t       = 這個世界上，充滿了美妙的料理和酣暢淋漓的戰鬥。活著真是美妙！
|vo_10_03_rm         = Zhège shìjiè shàng, chōngmǎnle měimiào de liàolǐ hé hānchàng línlí de zhàndòu. Huózhe zhēnshi měimiào!
|vo_10_03_tl         = This world is stuffed with wonderful cuisines and fights worth gorging on. Being alive is beautiful!
|vo_10_04_title_s    = 讨厌的食物…
|vo_10_04_title_t    = 討厭的食物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx_s       = 食物和武器是一样的。真正的战士不会挑剔兵器，也不会挑剔食物。你也不要挑食啊。
|vo_10_04_tx_t       = 食物和武器是一樣的。真正的戰士不會挑剔兵器，也不會挑剔食物。（你/妳）也不要挑食啊。
|vo_10_04_rm         = Shíwù hé wǔqì shì yīyàng de. Zhēnzhèng de zhànshì bùhuì tiāotì bīngqì, yě bùhuì tiāotì shíwù. Nǐ yě bùyào tiāoshí a.
|vo_10_04_tl         = Food is like weaponry. A true warrior isn't picky about [their] weapon, nor are [they] picky about [their] food. Don't be picky, now!

|vo_12_01_rm         = Yō, huǒbàn, shēngrìkuàilè! Yǒu shénme xiǎng tòngdǎ yīdùn de rén ma? Yǒu de huà, jiù jǐnguǎn shuō chūlái ba!

|vo_13_01_title_s    = 突破的感受・起

|vo_13_01_tx_s       = 喔！好像变强了一些。找谁试试好了…
|vo_13_01_tx_t       = 喔！好像變強了一些。找誰試試好了…
|vo_13_01_rm         = Wò! Hǎoxiàng biàn qiángle yīxiē. Zhǎo shéi shì shì hǎole...
|vo_13_01_tl         = Whoa, it seems like [I've] become a bit stronger. Now, to find someone to test it out on...
|vo_13_02_title_s    = 突破的感受・承
|vo_13_02_title_t    = 突破的感受・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx_s       = 「战士的力量就像一个圆。圆越大，能挑战的人就越多。」欸，这句话是谁说的来着…
|vo_13_02_tx_t       = 「戰士的力量就像一個圓。圓越大，能挑戰的人就越多。」欸，這句話是誰說的來著…
|vo_13_02_rm         = "Zhànshì dì lìliàng jiù xiàng yīgè yuán. Yuán yuè dà, néng tiǎozhàn de rén jiù yuè duō." Āi, zhè jù huà shì shéi shuō de láizhe...
|vo_13_02_tl         = "A warrior's strength is like a sphere. As the sphere expands, [they] can challenge even more opponents." Eh, who did [I] hear this from, again?
|vo_13_03_title_s    = 突破的感受・转
|vo_13_03_title_t    = 突破的感受・轉
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx_s       = 真不错！伙伴，多亏了你，我离「征服世界」的目标又近了一步。就连女皇大人，也不曾料想过我这样的成长吧。
|vo_13_03_tx_t       = 真不錯！夥伴，多虧了（你/妳），我離「征服世界」的目標又近了一步。就連女皇大人，也不曾料想過我這樣的成長吧。
|vo_13_03_rm         = Zhēn bùcuò! Huǒbàn, duōkuīle nǐ, wǒ lí "zhēngfú shìjiè" de mùbiāo yòu jìnle yībù. Jiù lián Nǚhuáng-dàrén, yě bùcéng liàoxiǎngguò wǒ zhèyàng de chéngzhǎng ba.
|vo_13_03_tl         = Not bad! Comrade, thanks to you, I'm another step closer to my goal of "conquering the world." I bet even Her Majesty the Tsaritsa would never have expected that I would grow this much.
|vo_13_04_title_s    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_title_t    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx_s       = 伙伴，你也要好好锻炼自己才行！不然的话，等我到达了世界的顶点，又有谁能与我殊死厮杀呢？哈哈哈。
|vo_13_04_tx_t       = 夥伴，（你/妳）也要好好鍛煉自己才行！不然的話，等我到達了世界的頂點，又有誰能與我殊死廝殺呢？哈哈哈。
|vo_13_04_rm         = Huǒbàn, nǐ yě yào hǎohǎo duànliàn zìjǐ cái xíng! Bùrán dehuà, děng wǒ dàodále shìjiè de dǐngdiǎn, yòu yǒu shéi néng yǔ wǒ shūsǐ sīshā ne? Hāhāhā.
|vo_13_04_tl         = Comrade, you'd better be staying on top of your training! If [you] don't, once I reach the summit of this world, who else would be able to fight me to the death? Hahaha.
}}
